title: Start
description: 0. You wake up in a dark room. The sound of machinery can be heard around you, but the room is empty. To the north is a door, and there is a small key on the floor.

title: Double doored room
description: You are in a room with two doors, one to the west and one to the east.

title: Double doored room
description: You are in a room with two doors, one to the west and one to the east.
